page.title: 08RELIGION (1)
page.content: The principal religion of the area is'Christianity'.Two main groups practice this belief;the{PROTESTANTS (Church of Scotland,Episcopalian, Baptist and the Free Church) and the {ROMAN CATHOLICS.}Both groups worship Jesus Christ,but differ in their interpretation of Canon Law,and in their approach to how worship should be conducted. There are however various ecumenical movements from the churches whose aim is to create an atmosphere of understanding and tolerance between the congregations.Many fine church buildings are in the area, ranging from the{15th Century Glasgow {Cathedral (Church of Scotland)}in the north,to{St.Andrew's Cathedral}on the banks of the Clyde which serves Roman Catholics.(continued on next page)
